name: Mission to Mars (Parker Williams)
description:
Title: Name of Game Platform: 

PC Game Genre: 

Platformer Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, General Audience

Game Overview: There are two modes: Endless and Boss Battle. In endless, survive for as long as you can amongst a swarm of alien creatures. In Boss Battle, attack the Goliath as the other try to protect their king. 

Instructions: WASD for movement, Spacebar to jump, left-mouse click to shoot

Parker Williams – Game Designer
